name: Miscellaneous
description: Settings related to message handling and bot behavior.

messageLinkPreview.name: Message Link Preview
messageLinkPreview.description: Enable or disable link previews for messages in the bot.

autoMessageTranslation.name: Auto Message Translation
autoMessageTranslation.description: Automatically translate messages in the bot to the default language.

voiceMessageTranscript.name: Voice Message Transcript
voiceMessageTranscript.description: Enable or disable transcription of voice messages in the bot.
